definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: The old lady has practised a lot at drawing and she is now a famous painter.
sentences.chinese: 这位老妇人刻苦练习绘画，她现在是一名著名画家了。

sentences.english: Age -old jade artifacts, gold and silver ornaments, and paintings - just to name a few.
sentences.chinese: 远古玉器，金银器，名画，还有好多其他的。

sentences.english: Competition between bidders for this valuable painting has been keen.
sentences.chinese: 拍卖时各出价人对这幅名画竞争很激烈。

sentences.english: We were so amazed and looked at the paintings one by one.
sentences.chinese: 我们万分惊叹，逐一仔细观看那些名画。

sentences.english: Penta- Bull plans, Chinese paintings handed down one of the top 10.
sentences.chinese: 五牛图，中国十大传世名画之一。

sentences.english: Just ask him what it's like to hold a Rembrandt.
sentences.chinese: 现在来问问他，手持伦勃朗名画的感觉。

sentences.english: The ugly frame detracts from the beauty of the famous picture.
sentences.chinese: 难看的框子有损这幅名画的美。

sentences.english: The valuable painting by a famous artist has been stayed up on the wall for many years.
sentences.chinese: 一位著名画家的珍贵油画已在墙上挂了许多年。

sentences.english: She had sat for famous painters like Rossetti.
sentences.chinese: 她为罗塞蒂等著名画家当过模特。

sentences.english: The picture was painted by a famous artist.
sentences.chinese: 这幅画是由一著名画家画的。

sentences.english: Rembrandt is a deservedly famous artist .
sentences.chinese: 伦勃朗是个当之无愧的名画家。

sentences.english: You've never actually stood there and looked up at that beautiful ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 你没试过站在那儿，昂首眺望天花板上的名画吧？

sentences.english: He stood there -ting the famous painting.
sentences.chinese: 他站在那里仔细地观赏着名画。

sentences.english: Helen: So, Gill gave us a run-down of the famous artists and their work on display here.
sentences.chinese: 很多各个历史时期著名画家的经典作品都收藏在这里。

sentences.english: Take your child to an art museum or let him have the opportunity to view world famous paintings.
sentences.chinese: 常带孩子去美术馆或让孩子欣赏世界名画。

sentences.english: In Amsterdam, I had eyes only for the Rembrandts.
sentences.chinese: 在阿姆斯特丹，我只想看伦勃朗的名画。

definition: authentic (painting or calligraphy)/genuine work (of famous artist)
Leonardo da Vinci (1452-1519), Italian Renaissance painter
to copy (a model of calligraphy or painting etc)
the strokes of a character/calligraphy and painting
